===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|Beginning Mandarin}} [[Miss]] (a term of address for a young or unmarried woman)
#: {{zh-x|王 小姐 來 了。|'''Miss''' Wang is here.}}
# a young lady
# {{lb|zh|slang}} [[barmaid]], [[prostitute]]

====Usage notes====
In china, 小姐 is less used to mean ''Miss'' because the meaning ''prostitute'' took over the original meaning, {{zh-l|女士}} is used instead.  Can still use 小姐 as a title (see usage example). Do not use 小姐 to call a waitress (Use neuter word {{zh-l|服務員}}). The definition may revert somewhat in the distant future (becoming similar to the word {{zh-l|姑娘}}).

====Synonyms====
* {{zh-l|女士|lady, miss}}
